description: An attacker can use the SID history attribute to gain additional privileges.
false_positives: Migration of an account into a new domain
name: Addition of SID History to Active Directory Object
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:("4765" OR "4766") OR ((winlog.event_id:"4738" AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.SidHistory:("\-" OR "%%1793")))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:winlog.event_data.SidHistory)))))
author: Thomas Patzke
@atc_project (improvements)
